mapper.select: select * from INFO_NOTICE order by FIX, CREATED_DATE desc
mapper.update: update INFO_NOTICE set VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 where NID = #{nid}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, NID, TITLE, CREATED_DATE, FIX, VIEWS from INFO_NOTICE where NID > 0 and rownum > 0 and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} order by FIX, CREATED_DATE desc
